titleStmt.title: Deplorable news from Southwark, or, The Loving lasses lamentations for the loss of their sweet-hearts

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vere, at the Angel, without New-gate,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
